DLG a
Snugglebat! It's you! Thanks for finding me. I didn't think anyone ever would. If you ask me, this is the best snugglespot, so please drop by whenever. It's good to know I have a friend. I'll be okay now.

DLG b
I saved you a spot, if you want to snuggle!

DLG d
I hear there's a lonely worm in a secret cave. Delicious... Plenty of room in our nest if you want to share.

DLG e
Yeah I know us flies got a bad rep, but join my swarm anytime.

DLG f
*Blink* That you, Snugglebat? Join the cuddle pile if you want a hug.

DLG g
Do ya think it's true there's a secret passage? I want to-- Zzzzzz... Mmm... Ribbit... snuggly... I like you.

DLG h
Chill with us for a while. I'll weave you a hammock.
